title: The Sons of Hercules: Land of Darkness

sources.title: SonofHerculesTheLandofDarkness
sources.description: The hero leaves on a quest to slay a beast, only to find his home taken prisoner when he returns. This film was originally an Italian film called "Ercole l'invincibile" which was later dubbed into English. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page . More information on the film series is also available from the Wikipedia article here .
